messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that all of the station's pets has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that all of the station's pets has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 mice have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Due to the amazing actions abord thuis station, i hereby declare that all threats have passed and repairs can begin peacefuly

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Okay so apparently comms is being fucked with or everyones dead so... yeah shuttle gets called very soon! survivors report to front oif command

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: EVA Storage.
